data_table.description: Anthropometry, Form ANTC, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ANTC1
variable.description: [Height and weight]. Standing height (to the nearest cm, rounding down). Q1 [Anthropometry Form, ANTC, exam 3]

variable.name: ANTC2
variable.description: [Height and weight]. Weight (to the nearest lb, rounding down). Q2 [Anthropometry Form, ANTC, exam 3]

variable.name: ANTC3A
variable.description: [Body size]. Waist girth (to the nearest cm, rounding down). Q3a [Anthropometry Form, ANTC, exam 3]

variable.name: ANTC3B
variable.description: [Body size].Hip girth (to the nearest cm, rounding down). Q3b [Anthropometry Form, ANTC, exam 3]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Anthropometry Form, ANTC, exam 3]
